topic.title: LONG TERM PHYSICAL HEALTH CONDITION (CODED CLINICAL ENTRY)
topic.shortdesc: LONG TERM PHYSICAL HEALTH CONDITION (CODED CLINICAL ENTRY) is the CODED CLINICAL ENTRY which is used to identify a Long Term Physical Health Condition.
